resources.string: Current Location Based \nApplication on Women Security
Are you registered ? or Sign Up
If you are already registered then Sign In

string.name: bulletedList
string.ul:
If you are attacked, go for the eyes, throat, and legs



If you are alone, donâ€™t have bags over your shoulders that can pull you over. Have the bag hanging loose so you can easily drop it



If someone grabs you around the throat, pull at one finger, not the hand



If you can kick the attacker, aim for the knee



If you are alone then use something you may have in your bag such as nail file, scissors, pins or brooches, scent bottles that can squirt in the eyes, Spanish spiked hair combs, etc



If you scream, call a name to make your attacker think there is someone near you 


If the situation is suitable and it is a threatened knife attack, wrap a coat around your arm as a shield



If you are attacked from behind, try and stamp on the attackers foot hard



If you have keys in your hand, use these to scratch the attacker



Keep your small bag mirror in your hand so you can check if you are being followed



If the road is clear, walk in the middle of the road



If you are carrying a handbag, remove money, keys, address books, phone, and keep these tucked in other clothing. Giving the bag may give you enough time to escape



If you are on the phone, keep talking about your location



If you are in a strangers car, photo the car and number plate even if it is a taxi 


Also try to remember a description of the driver. Age, colour, weight, height, accent, clothes, accessories, tattoos, etc
